about.subtitle: Let me introduce myself
about.title: About Me
about.paragraphShort: The first time I saw a computer was when I was 6 years old at my cousin’s house, and I was fascinated by everything...
about.paragraphLong: The first time I saw a computer was when I was 6 years old at my cousin’s house, and I was fascinated by everything you could do with it. When I was 7, I got my first computer, and around age 8, the internet entered my life. From that moment on, I discovered YouTube and developed an admiration for YouTubers and videos. Wanting to be like them, I started researching how to edit my own videos, and that’s when I found my first editing software: 'Camtasia Studio'. Later, I switched to 'Sony Vegas Pro', which was more professional in some aspects. In 2021, I started editing videos for a Marketing and Web Programming Agency, and I entered the world of animation using more professional tools like Adobe After Effects, which allowed me to bring more dynamism to my productions. In 2023, I started studying to become a Systems Analyst, and I learned the basics of web development, which was what caught my attention the most in the program because it's one of the most artistic aspects — it involves design and pre-production, which could be combined with everything I was already doing. I'm also a big fan of futuristic art, which is why this website’s design looks the way it does. I hope you enjoy my work, and I look forward to contributing great ideas to your projects. Enjoy my website.
